propositions.text: The author of '媚公卿' is 張煌言.
The work '媚公卿' is attributed to the Ming Dynasty.
The document's structure consists of a main title and repeated occurrences of the title and author information.

concepts.name: 媚公卿
concepts.context: This is the main title and repeatedly appears throughout the document.

concepts.name: 張煌言
concepts.context: This is the author's name, repeatedly associated with the title '媚公卿'.

concepts.name: 明
concepts.context: This indicates the dynasty (Ming) to which the author and work belong.

concepts.name: Title
concepts.context: The primary heading of the document.

concepts.name: Author
concepts.context: The attributed writer of the document.

concepts.name: Dynasty
concepts.context: The historical period of the author/work.

concepts.name: Structure
concepts.context: The arrangement and repetition of elements in the document.

hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a main title ('# 媚公卿'), followed by repeated sections that include a title ('## 媚公卿' or '### 媚公卿'), the author's name ('（明）张煌言'), and horizontal rules. This indicates a highly repetitive structure with the core information (title, author, dynasty) being emphasized through repetition.
